card.name: Sloth 14
card.description: Create mechanism to process if blocks

acceptance-criteria.criterium: Detect that there's a statement starting with "if" keyword
Count number of "if" keywords until same level "endif" keyword appears
When expression is met remove Toe tags with "if" and "endif" keywords and pass everything in between to evaluation
When expression isn't met remove everything between the Toe tags and Toe tags as well
